column2: Maglor, son of Mighty Feanor has been, living here for ages. He offers to join you, if you will have him.
Maglor? Kinslayer and accursed? I think not!
Away with Fellowship of the Ring
This character is braving many dangers, in order to save the world from Sauron's dominion.
Using foul sorcery, Saruman has made this character a mere shadow of his former self and weakened his realm.
Is away in distant lands tracking the ring bearer.
